2.<center>|怒れるガズバランが 打ち込みし|炎のくさびは 大地を焼きつくし: The wedge of flame driven by the angry|Gazbaran consumed the earth.<end>

3.<center>|我の うつろなる身を満たすのは 復讐の念。|我は そなたを 滅: What fills my empty body is resurrection. I|will destroy you.<end>

5.<center>|哀れみのピナヘトが 打ち込みし|氷のくさびは 糧を凍らせつくし: The wedge of ice, driven by Pinnaheth the|Compassionate, froze our sustenance.<end>

6.<center>|我の うつろなる身を満たすのは 復讐の念。|我は そなたを 滅: What fills my empty body is resurrection. I|will destroy you.<end>

8.<center>|荒ぶるワギが 打ち込みし|闇のくさびは 光ある大地を奪った……: The wedge of darkness driven by the raging|wagis has robbed the land of its light.<end>

9.<center>|我の うつろなる身を満たすのは 復讐の念。|我は そなたを 滅: What fills my empty body is resurrection. I|will destroy you.<end>

11.<center>|嘆きのマリーヌが 打ち込みし|水のくさびは 水底に町を沈めた…: The wedge of water driven in by the|lamenting Marines has sunk the city to the|bottom of the sea.<end>

12.<center>|我の うつろなる身を満たすのは 復讐の念。|我は そなたを 滅: What fills my empty body is resurrection. I|will destroy you.<end>

14.<center>|悔やめるエルドナが 打ち込みし|嵐のくさびは 天地を吹き荒らし: The wedge of the storm driven by the|repentant Erdna has blown through heaven and|earth.<end>

15.<center>|我の うつろなる身を満たすのは 復讐の念。|我は そなたを 滅: What fills my empty body is resurrection. I|will destroy you.<end>

16.<left>竜神の柩への道が 開かれた！: The way to the dragon god's hearse is open!

17.<left>なんと 銀の森の 不思議な霧が晴れあがり|<left>森の奥へと 進: Mysterious mists of the silver forest have lifted|Now we can move deeper into the woods!<me 71>
